name: Unconditional Recycled Cotton Basic T-Shirt
description:
• Recycled cotton T-shirt by Unconditional. Featuring a marl finish, rolled short sleeves and raw edging to the round neck.

    This garment is made from recycled cotton, formed of 90% post-production cotton scraps, broken down in to fiber form, blended with polyester and then re-knitted. This process reduces water consumption, drastically decreases landfill and in turn saves energy.

    Model wears a Size Small
careInfo: Cool wash, do not bleach, iron cool, do not tumble dry
